question_text: Youâ€™re building a PC that includes a high-end GPU with dual 8-pin power connectors. What must be verified before selecting a power supply?
answer_options: That the PSU has dual PCIe power cables
That the PSU fan spins in reverse
That the PSU uses gold-plated terminals
That the PSU is rated for Wi-Fi 6
correct_answer: That the PSU has dual PCIe power cables
explanation: The GPU requires two dedicated 8-pin PCIe connectors. The PSU must include enough native PCIe power outputs to support it.
